BcTextField.playgroundDocsDescription:
**Interactive Playground**

You can try all important features and props live.

- Label, helperText, debounce, minInputLength, cache, highlight, recent searches, keyboard shortcuts, grouping, advanced filtering, export/import, async validation and more!
- Change props from the right panel, see the result instantly.

BcTextField.additionalPropsInfoDescription: Complete list of all available props for BcTextField component. These props are not shown in the controls panel to keep the interface clean and fast, but they are fully functional and can be used in your code.
